Question: Deepagro CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Deepagro

Product: SprAI

- Selective herbicide application technology
- Integrates AI and computer vision for precision spraying
- Reduces agrochemical use by up to 70%
- Utilizes RGB cameras and computer system for real-time selective herbicide application
- Can be mounted on any spraying equipment for efficient and sustainable farming practices
Summary_cn:
Deepagro

产品：SprAI

- 选择性除草剂应用技术
- 结合人工智能和计算机视觉进行精准喷雾
- 减少农药使用量高达70%
- 利用RGB摄像头和计算机系统实时进行选择性除草剂应用
- 可以安装在任何喷洒设备上，实现高效可持续的农业实践
